'Animal X' is a Romanian band awarded at MTV Europe Music Awards, with more than
10 years of musical experience. Their eight studio albums include such hits as
"N-am crezut", "Pentru ea", "Mai mult ca oricand", "Sa pot ierta", "Baieti
derbedei", "Balada", and "Nisip purtat de vant".
